## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing (`poetry run pytest -q`)
- [ ] Type checks clean (`poetry run mypy .`)
- [ ] Pre-commit passed (`poetry run pre-commit run --all-files`)
- [ ] Docs/README updated (if user-visible changes)
- [ ] Conventional Commit title
- [ ] Signed-off-by in commits (DCO)
